variants.Description in input context: PARK6 mutations (G309D, E417G, CΔ145) in PINK1 gene

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Confocal imaging of cultured substantia nigra dopaminergic neurons

Material used.Description: Confocal imaging performed on cultured SN dopaminergic neurons from PINK1 knockout mice

Experiment Method.Readout type: Qualitative and quantitative (ΔΨm, mitochondrial morphology, ROS levels)

Readout description.Result Description: PINK1 knockout neurons exhibited depolarized ΔΨm, fragmented mitochondria, and elevated ROS levels
Wild-type PINK1 overexpression rescued ΔΨm, mitochondrial morphology, and ROS levels
Mutant PINK1 variants (G309D, E417G, CΔ145) failed to rescue ΔΨm, mitochondrial morphology, or ROS levels

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 overexpression used as positive control

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector used as negative control

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal ΔΨm, intact mitochondrial morphology, and ROS levels within physiological range

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Depolarized ΔΨm, fragmented mitochondria, and elevated ROS levels
